column5: Happy Canada Day !! I hope you're having a relaxing and enjoyable holiday weekend. Ya'll have a history, a country, and a culture to be very proud of. It's good to have you as neighbors.
Happy Canada Day to my Northern neighbours! I wish I was celebrating this day with you in Ontario!!
JayM5209, I couldn't have said it better - so I wont try!!
HAPPY 146 CANADA, enjoy the day Friends
Thank you! I am having a beer on this beautiful day. And you have a wonderful fourth of July in a few more days!! Fisherman 1792

What a wonderful message. Thanks to all! We are having a terrific day here in Caledonia (mooneye fishing capitol of the world, so I hear, I couldn't pick one out of a line-up). Thanks again, lovely sentiment. Jim
Great post! Happy Canada Day to our friends north of the border!
Thanks and enjoy your 4th of July. Was a hot sunny summer day today....perfection.
